Name: Person
Text: Hello, [c_red]how[/c] are you?[show_message,hello world!] This is some example dialogue for the gossip engine for Gamemaker Studio 2.

Name: Person
Text: I love sunny weather! It always makes me feel so refreshed and energetic.

Name: Person
Text: Cold? Sometimes the cold can be really cozy. Bundle up!

Name: Person
Text: I love the rain! Just be sure to layer up before going out. Unless you like getting soaked!

Name: Person
Text: Windy, huh? Be sure to close those windows! Don't want your precious papers flying away with the wind.

Name: Person
Text: Night time, is it? Maybe you should be getting ready for bed!
